Interface Features

Analysis features and options.

Hierarchy

  • Features

Index

Properties

  • categories
  • concepts
  • emotion

Properties

Optional categories

categories: CategoriesOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:444

Whether or not to return the high level category the content is categorized as (i.e. news, art).

Optional concepts

concepts: ConceptsOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:428

Whether or not to return the concepts that are mentioned in the analyzed text.

Optional emotion

emotion: EmotionOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:430

Whether or not to extract the emotions implied in the analyzed text.

Optional entities

entities: EntitiesOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:432

Whether or not to extract detected entity objects from the analyzed text.

Optional keywords

keywords: KeywordsOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:434

Whether or not to return the keywords in the analyzed text.

Optional metadata

metadata: MetadataOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:436

Whether or not the author, publication date, and title of the analyzed text should be returned. This parameter is only available for URL and HTML input.

Optional relations

relations: RelationsOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:438

Whether or not to return the relationships between detected entities in the analyzed text.

Optional semantic_roles

semantic_roles: SemanticRolesOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:440

Whether or not to return the subject-action-object relations from the analyzed text.

Optional sentiment

sentiment: SentimentOptions
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:442

Whether or not to return the overall sentiment of the analyzed text.
